import { useState } from "react"; const CreateItem = () => { //State const [value, setValue] = useState({ name: '', net: '', favourite: false, gross: 0, }) //handler Function const handleValChange = (e: React.ChangeEvent) => { setValue({ ...value, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); } const handleAddItem = async (e: React.FormEvent) => { console.log("in here") } return (
handleAddItem(e)}>
handleValChange(e)} />
handleValChange(e)} />

) } export default CreateItem
